messages.subject: taking a break
messages.msgSnippet: I m going no mail for a few months. I m finding the computer a bit of a distraction at the moment and it s getting in the way of me spending time with my kids.
messages.messageBody:
I'm going no mail for a few months. I'm finding the computer a bit of a
distraction at the moment and it's getting in the way of me spending time
with my kids.

My head is also feeling 'swirly', particularly after the recent discussion
about faith and unschooling, so I am going to take some time to think about
this some more.

BUT, I'll be back!

The new school year begins next week and it's a great feeling NOT to be
preparing for it and to know that my kids haven't been aware that it is that
time of the year.
Here's to freedom!!

Julie
